nodes.text: The Weary Traveler was one of the two small cantinas in Anchorhead on Tatooine during the time of the Clone Wars.

Obi-Wan Kenobi frequented this cantina during the initial stages of his self-imposed exile on Tatooine. It featured a HoloNet receiver, a vaporator, and a selection of offworld brandy. It was here that Obi-Wan learned of Darth Vader's survival after leaving him for dead on Mustafar. Shortly after receiving this news, Obi-Wan was visited for the first time by the Force ghost of Qui-Gon Jinn.
